title: Cringe Shield X
author: Nur Tasin
synopsis: CringeShieldX is a browser extension that filters out cringe-worthy YouTube content. Customize block lists, install via Tampermonkey, and enjoy cringe-free browsing.

title: Device Session Manager
author: Nur Tasin
synopsis: A guide on managing user sessions in Express and React, covering authentication, device management, session tracking, and aggregation.
